Key Match Events: Gooooool for Moldova. Vadim Rațăă finishes in front of the goalkeeper to make it 1-0.
Pre-Game Insights: DT of San Marino in his career, Cevoli wore the jerseys of San Marino, Jesina, Fano, Carpi, Reggina, Reggiana, Torino, Cesena, Crotone and Modena.
On December 12, 2023, he was confirmed as coach of the San Marino national team.

Top scorer for Moldova, Nicolaescu is an international with the Moldovan national soccer team, for which he became the top scorer in history by scoring three goals in a 3-2 victory over the Polish national soccer team in a Euro 2024 qualifier.
San Marino's top scorer, Andy Selva, is the top scorer in the history of his national team with 127 goals.
Moldova starts better, with the intention of doing damage from the beginning.
San Marino loses the ball very quickly when coming out and is causing defenders to foul.
In the second half, San Marino made several changes to turn the situation around, but failed to create dangerous chances and Moldova failed to take advantage of the spaces to increase their lead.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The friendly match between Moldova and San Marino ended with a 1-0 victory for Moldova.
Others: Zimbru Stadium is a soccer stadium located in Chisinau (Moldova) that was inaugurated in 2006 and has a capacity of 10 500 spectators.
